original_text: And the number of the gold rats was according to the number of Philistine towns belonging to the five rulers—the fortified towns with their country villages. The large rock on which the Levites set the ark of the Lord is a witness to this day in the field of Joshua of Beth Shemesh.
korean_text: 드린 바 금 쥐들은 견고한 성읍에서부터 시골의 마을에까지 그리고 사람들이 여호와의 궤를 큰 돌에 이르기까지 다섯 방백들에게 속한 블레셋 사람들의 모든 성읍들의 수대로였더라 그 돌은 벧세메스 사람 여호수아의 밭에 오늘까지 있더라

sentences.original_text: And the number of the gold rats
was according to the number of Philistine towns
the fortified towns with their country villages
The large rock on which the Levites set the ark
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람들이 법궤를 놓았던 큰 바위는

sentences.original_text: is a witness to this day
in the field of Joshua of Beth Shemesh
